name: SEMA API
author: SEMA Data

sections.description:
The plugin is built to automatically transfer auto parts data from SEMA Data Coop to WordPress/wooCommerce. A comprehensive frontend catalog search page offers functions like year make model search, vehicle compatible fitment sheet and parts attributes fitlers.
Just download the plugin, select the brands and categories of products you want to list, and begin automated imports to your online store, while simultaneously allowing product searches by vehicle, categories, and attribute filters.
Here’s a link to Frontend Demo
sections.faq:
Do I have to have SEMA SDC account?

Yes, you might need it to generate a token for API import purpose.

Does this plugin import product images?

Yes. You can import product images along with other details and attribute

Do I have to create a catalog search page?

Our plugin will create a catalog search page automatically.

sections.reviews:
Good addition to your automotive parts website

By autospecialties1234 on April 5, 2023

This plugin changed a lot for me. There wasn't a plugin for year, make, model search that was available unless you put everything in manually. I don't have the time for that. This plugin does it all for you, including attributes, images, titles, slugs, price, descriptions, etc. Some manufacturers give more information than others, so it is dependent on what the manufacturer has added. Most are pretty good and gives you a good base to build a nice product page. It also makes it's own categories, runs your search, and gives you many filters for your customers. It is also customizable. I use a child theme and can change anything as long as you target it correctly. This plug-in with a little css turned my site from mediocre to something that can match a site like Summit Racing. I highly recommend this plug-in; it will make your life a lot easier and give that professional feel to your site, so your customers are more likely to trust you and complete a purchase. Oh, and it's free! Which is great! The support for this plug-in is the best out there. After talking with a lot of different developers about issues nobody takes the hands-on approach that SEMA does. Any issue I have I just e-mail them; they get right back to me and have also taught me quite a bit of stuff and helped me succeed. Give it a try you won't be disappointed!

Absolutely no customization

By TC (chopperstwisted) on March 29, 2023

Great Idea if it had the options needed to properly implement the product data. I'm not sure what good this plugin does without the ability to customize it.

First off, the images wouldn't load.

You are forced to upload every product contained within a category. That means zero choices to hand-pick products from a brand.

Forget about mapping attributes to the proper places. Everything is grouped together in the description or the short description. There are no options to merge, split or map data.

Ideally one would map the UPC/GTIN, MPN, Harmonized codes, etc... to their corresponding places in woocommerce. That's not an option.

Fitment data is not accessible within the product editing page.
